p.seg: State of Nebraska Department of Trade and Commerce Bureau ot Insurance Summary of Insurance Business in Nebraska lor the Year 1922 Also Comparative Figures ot Authorized Companies for the Years 1 919, 1920 and 19:1 CHARLES \Y BRYAN, Governor M. A. FAIRCHILD, ■iiititar.t Chief of Bureau of Ik Deputy Secretary of Trade and Commr K. C. KNUDSON,

To His Excellency: Hon. Charles W. Bryan, Governor. We hereby submit the summary of business of companies authorized to write insurance in this State for the year ending December 31, 1922, including the names of companies organized, admitted, reinsured, with - drawn etc., during the year. DEPARTMENT OF TRADE AND COMMERCE K. C. KNUDSEN, Deputy Secretary M. A. FAIRCHILD, Assistant Chief of the Bureau of Insurance,

ATION NKBRASKA INSURANCE REPORT ■» COMPANIES IN PROCESS OF LIQUID Bankers Automobile, Lincoln Bankers Fire, Lincoln Lion Bonding & Surety, Omaha National Fidelity & Casualty Company, Omaha Pyramid Mutual Accident, Omaha. COMPANIES ORGANIZED Sons and Daughters of Mercy, Omaha, Nebraska.

NEBRASKA INSURANCE REPORT I COMPANIES THAT CHANGED NAME, WITHDREW, REINSURED, ETC, IN 1922. American Inter-Insurance Exchange, Kansas City, Mo., Withdrew May 1, 1922. Automobile Assurance Alliance, Kansas City, Mo Withdrew May 1, 1922. Bankers Fire Ins. Co., Lincoln, Reinsured in National Security Fire, Omaha, April 1922. Cedar County Farmers Mutual, Hartington, Retired and Dissolved Corporation August 21, 1922. Central National Fire, Des Moines, Reinsured in Connecticut Fire, June 1, 1922 Central West Fire, Bloomington, Illinois, License revoked July 6, 1922. Century Insurance Co., Edinburgh, Scotland, Withdrew May 1, 1922. Federal Union Insurance Co., Chicago, 111 Withdrew May 1, 1922. Globe National Insurance Co., Sioux City, Iowa, Withdrew May 1, 1922. Great Western Accident Insurance Co., Des Moines, Iowa, Changed name to Great Western Insurance Co. December 22, 1922. Iowa Bonding & Casualty Company, Des Moines, Iowa, Reinsured with Southern Surety Company, April 30, 1922. Liberty Life of Lincoln, Changed name to Lincoln Liberty Life, January 1922. Merchants Life & Casualty Company, Minneapolis, Minn., License revoked, May 15, 1922. Masonic Protective Ass'n., Worchester, Mass., Changed name to Massachusetts Protective Ass'n., February 1922. National Underwriters, a reciprocal exchange, Changed to National Retailers Mutual Fire, and admitted on Feb ruary 28, 1922. Netherlands Fire & Life Changed name to Netherlands Insurance Company, September 1922. Patriotic Assurance Co., of Dublin, Ireland, Reinsured in Patriotic Insurance Company of America, December 21, 1922. 'rovident Life & Trust Company, Philadelphia, Pa., Changed to Provident Mutual Life Ins. Co., December 29, 1922 Scandinavian American Insurance Co., Christiana, Norway., Withdrew May 1, 1922. Scandinavian Mutual Aid Ass'n. Minden, Changed name to Central Mutual Aid Ass'n., May 1, 1922, and then to Central Life Association, Minden to Omaha, on July 24, 1922. Jnion Life & Accident, Lincoln, Reinsured life business in State Life of Iowa, May 1922, and acci - dent business in Federal Insurance Company, Lincoln. ' : nion Marine Insurance Co. Ltd., Liverpool, England, Withdrew May 1, 1922. nited States Insurance Co., Lincoln, Reinsured in Federal Insurance Co., Lincoln.

* NEBRASKA INSURANCE REPORT COMPANIES ADMITTED DURING 1922 STOCK FIRE INSURANCE COMPANIES ADMITTED DURING 1922. Chicago Fire and Marine Ins. Co., Chicago, Illinois. Admitted August 20th, 1922. Writes Fire insurance. Detroit Fire & Marine Ins. Co., Detroit, Michigan. Admitted July 14th, 1922. Writes Fire and Marine insurance. Eagle Star & British Dominion, Chicago, Illinois. Admitted July 6th 1922. Writes Fire and Marine insurance. Granite State Fire Insurance Co., Portsmouth, N. H. Admitted May 31, 1922. Writes Fire and Tornado insurance. Great Republic Insurance Co., Des Moines, Iowa. Admitted March 13 1922. Writes Fire and Marine insurance. Henry Clay Fire Insurance Co., Lexington, Kentucky. Admitted Oc - tober 5th, 1922. Writes Fire insurance. Merchants Fire Assurance Corp. of New York. Admitted December 14 1922. Writes Fire and Marine insurance. National Reserve Company, Dubuque, Iowa. Admitted June 19, 1922 Writes Fire, Marine and Inland Navigation. Patriotic Insurance Co. of America, New York. Admitted Dec. 21, 1922 Writes Fire insurance. Prudential Insurance Co. of Great Britain, Newark, N. J. Admitte May 1, 1922. Writes Fire and Marine insurance. Republic Fire Insurance Co., Pittsburgh, Pa. Admitted May 1, 1922 Writes Fire insurance. Superior Fire Insurance Co., Pittsburgh, Pa. Admitted July 6, 1922 Writes Fire and Miscellaneous insurance. Union Hispano Americano Insurance Co., New York. Admitted May 1st, 1922. Writes Fire and Marine insurance. United Firemen's Insurance Co., Philadelphia, Pa. Admitted August 9 1922. Writes Tornado, Sprinkler Leakage, Inland & Ocean Marine Fire and Auto.

NEBRASKA INSURANCE KEPORT 7 MUTUAL, FIRE, TORNADO AND HAIL INSURANCE COMPANIES National Retailers Mutual Ins. Co., Chicago, 111. Admitted March 1st, 1922. Writes Fire insurance. STOCK LEGAL RESERVE LIFE INSURANCE COMPANIES Dakota Life Insurance Co., Watertown, S. D. Admitted May 2, 1922. Writes Life insurance. Jefferson Standard Life Insurance Co., Greensboro, N. C. Admitted July 6, 1922. Writes Life insurance. National Reserve Life Insurance Co., Topeka, Kansas. Admitted May 1, 1922. Writes Life, Permanent & Total Disability. Northern States Life Insurance Co., Minneapolis, Minn. Admitted May 23, 1922. Writes Life insurance. State Life of Iowa, Des Moines, Iowa. Admitted May 1, 1922. Writes Life insurance. CASUALTY, SURETY AND MISCELLANEOUS COMPANIES Commercial Casualty Insurance Co., Newark, N. J. Admitted July 24, 1922. Writes Accident, Health, Automobile, Property Damage & Collision, Fidelity & Surety, Liability, Teams Property Damage, Compensation, Burglary and Plate Glass. Detroit Fidelity & Surety Co., Detroit, Michigan. Admitted September 18, 1922. Writes Fidelity & Surety. Federal Casualty Insurance Co., Detroit, Michigan. Admitted July 7, 1922. Writes Health and Accident insurance. Federal Surety Co., Davenport, Iowa. Admitted Dec. 15, 1922. Writes Fidelity & Surety; Accident and Health; Sprinkler Leakage; Work - men's Compensation; Public Liability; Property Damage; Burglary and Theft and Plate Glass. Indemnity Insurance Co. of North America, Philadelphia, Pa. Admitted March 6, 1922. Writes Accident and Health insurance. Liberty Mutual Insurance Company, Boston, Mass. Admitted May 1, 1922. Writes Liability and Workmen's Compensation. Masonic Accident Insurance Co., Springfield, Mass. Admitted May 2, 1922. Writes Accident and Health insurance. N'orthwestem Casualty & Surety Company, Milwaukee, Wis. Admitted December 14, 1922. Writes Accident and Health; Liability, Fidelity, and other casualty lines provided in Articles of Incorporation. 'hoenix Indemnity Insurance Co., New York. Admitted November 21st, 1922. Write? Personal Accident and Health, Workmen's Compen - sation, Employers' Liability, Public Liability, Automobile Collision, Aircraft, Automobile, Elevator and Teams Property Damage, Bur - glary Theft, Robbery and Forgery, and Glass insurance. FRATERNALS travelers Protective Association, St. Louis, Missouri. Admitted May 1st, 1922. ASSESSMENT HAIL armers Mutual Hail of Iowa, Des Moines, Iowa. Admitted March 2nd. 1922. Writes Hail insurance.
